data.title: Legends Boxing Opens Second Texas Studio
data.meta_description: Salt Lake City, UT.; January 28, 2020 – Salt Lake City based Legends Boxing announces the opening of their 1 st location in Austin. The gym is located in…
data.text:
For additional information visit legendsboxing.com.

Salt Lake City, UT.; January 28, 2020 – Salt Lake City based Legends Boxing announces the opening of their 1st location in Austin. The gym is located in South Austin and is owned and operated by Lynette and Jared Fields.

Legends Boxing was co-founded in 2011 by Andrew Scott, a two time Golden Gloves State Champion, with a mission to provide the ultimate full body workout, while learning real USA Boxing techniques and step-by-step fitness boxing classes.

The Fields come to the concept from an esteemed and successful background. Immediately after graduating from BYU Law School, Jared began his career as a Realtor and founded The Fields Team with Keller Williams, one of the top producing real estate teams in Utah. Lynette is the proud and very busy mom of their three children, ages 10, 8 and 6. They are an incredibly active couple who have run Spartan races all over the country in addition to other races and competitions. Lynette has been a fitness competitor and fitness model and as a family, love the outdoors, fishing and traveling.

Jared’s company sponsored the Legends Boxing Executive Fight Night event along with the Police vs Fire Fight Night and then he jumped into the ring as a competitor in 2018 and 2019. Through these experiences, he became such a huge believer in the Legend Boxing brand, philosophy and systems he knew he had to be part of the Legends tribe and family. “Through these experiences, I became a huge believer in the Legends Boxing philosophy and systems,” said Jared. “I love that my wife and family are part of this amazing concept.”

The Legends Boxing South Austin location is the first of three locations planned for development by the Fields. “We have fallen in love with Austin in the past several years and are thrilled to bring this amazing concept to this beautiful culture and thriving community,” says Lynette.

Legends Boxing is located at 9001 Brodie Lane in the Brodie Park Shopping Center. For hours, classes and to learn more about Legends Boxing South Austin, please go to https://www.legendsboxing.com/gym/southaustin.

**** MEDIA ALERT ****

To celebrate, the Legends Boxing is hosting an Open House and Ceremonial Ribbon Cutting event with the which is open the public to tours, enjoy amazing refreshments and food trucks, view actual Legends Boxing work-out, give-a-ways and register to win prizes including memberships.

WHO: Legends Boxing - South Austin - Meet the Owners, Lynette and Jared Fields

WHERE: 9001 Brodie Lane Suite C9, Brodie Park Shopping Center

WHEN: February 15th, 2020 10am-2pm Call 512.387.8045 for additional information

WHAT: Open House and Ceremonial Ribbon Cutting with the Greater Austin Chamber of Commerce

Food Trucks

Give-a-ways and prizes

Music, Face Painters – fun for the whole family and dogs welcome too!

Learn real USA Boxing and see and actual Legends Boxing workout

About Legends Boxing

Founded in 2011, Legends’ success begins with its fitness focus. Andrew Scott, Legends Boxing co-founder and National Head Coach and two time Golden Gloves State champion, created this revolutionary workout from his extensive years of boxing and physical training. Each workout incorporates functional movements while teaching valuable, lifelong skills. Boxing is a full-body workout that builds strength, agility, and confidence, and these elements are at the core of each class. The concept began franchising in 2019 and currently has 9 open locations in the US with another 22 in development. For additional information visit legendsboxing.com.
